channel.title: Deployment Guide on My AWS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Deployment Guide on My AWS Workshop

item.title: Amazon Elasticsearch
item.description: Deployment Steps Click here to go to the application page in the AWS Serverless Repository (SAR). Click the deploy button on the right. Steve Francia You will be directed to the deployment page, which include a ReadMe and Application settings. By default, the application will be deployed in us-east-1 region, change the AWS console via the region drop down in the top right of the console to your desired region to deploy this solution to another region.

item.title: Splunk
item.description: Deployment Steps Click here to go to the application page in the AWS Serverless Repository (SAR). Click the deploy button on the right. Steve Francia You will be directed to the deployment page, which include a ReadMe and Application settings. By default, the application will be deployed in us-east-1 region, change the AWS console via the region drop down in the top right of the console to your desired region to deploy this solution to another region.
